text:
It would be nice if one could specify a "finalize" target in an Ant project. 
This target should be executet in any case - even if the build fails somewhere 
in the middle of the run.
For example, in this target one could do some "cleanup" tasks.
creator: thomas.schumacher@drkw.com
jan@materne.de
text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 17973 ***
